sources.title: Bug Carnival (1937)
sources.description: Bug Carnival is a Terrytoons cartoon directed by Mannie Davis, George Gordon. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bug-carnival-1937/

metadata.Plot: This is a black and white terrytoon cartoon, from 1937. Brief synopsis: A boy and girl fly are performers for the bug Carnival. The boy and girl fly are chased by the big ugly spider. The spider kidnaps the girl and the boy chases the spider. The boy fights with the spider until he wins and is able to release the girl.
metadata.Writer: Joseph Barbera, Dan Gordon, Paul Terry
